name: Validate e-mail addresses by Loqate and create new customers in WooCommerce for new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the email address by Loqate and create new customer in WooCommerce. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16SfUNV2akow7vuQGEUzEoYvkHzF8iMKZdzTvALFN0kc/edit?usp=sharing).
